>>>DOCUMENT

######################################################################

title:: Valid Italics Markup

id:: td-000040

######################################################################

This document contains several examples of valid italics markup.

One ~~word~~ is italics in this sentence.

~~This entire line is italics.~~

Only ~~two words~~ in this line are italics.

This ~~paragraph~~ has several ~~italics~~ words in ~~it~~.

<<<DOCUMENT
